snippet: Santi Cazorla scored three goals as Arsenal bounced back from its recent disappointments with a 5-2 win over host Reading, which is in last place in the Premier League.
abstract: Arsenal defeats Reading, 5-2, in English Premiere League soccer.
lead_paragraph: Santi Cazorla scored three goals as Arsenal bounced back from its recent disappointments with a 5-2 win over host Reading, which is in last place in the Premier League.
